div.p: I have had this site since 1995, but the oldest parts are in fact from 1994, which makes twenty years of presence on the web. I have thought about this for a while. For example, should I keep the site or through it away?
I've discussed why before. After that, I've decided to keep it whenever I pay the bill to my provider.
So, assuming that I keep it, then
